verses.verse: And it came to pass <S%H1961><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, that when Yitz'chak <S%H3327><s%> was old <S%H2204><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and his eyes <S%H5869><s%> were dim <S%H3543><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, so that he could not see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, he called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Esav <S%H6215><s%> his eldest <S%H1419><s%> son <S%H1121><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him, My son <S%H1121><s%>: and he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him, Behold, here am I.
And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Behold now, I am old <S%H2204><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, I know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not the day <S%H3117><s%> of my death <S%H4194><s%>:

Now therefore take <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, I pray thee, thy weapons <S%H3627><s%>, thy quiver <S%H8522><s%> and thy bow <S%H7198><s%>, and go out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8798><s%> to the field <S%H7704><s%>, and take <S%H6679><s%> <S%H8798><s%> me some venison <S%H6718><s%> <S%H8675><s%> <S%H6720><s%>;

And make <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8798><s%> me savoury meat <S%H4303><s%>, such as <S%H834><s%> I love <S%H157><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H8685><s%> it to me, that I may eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%>; that my soul <S%H5315><s%> may bless <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8762><s%> thee before <S%H2962><s%> I die <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

And Rebekah <S%H7259><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8802><s%> when Yitz'chak <S%H3327><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8763><s%> to Esav <S%H6215><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>. And Esav <S%H6215><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to the field <S%H7704><s%> to hunt <S%H6679><s%> <S%H8800><s%> for venison <S%H6718><s%>, and to bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H8687><s%> it.

And Rebekah <S%H7259><s%> spake <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%> her son <S%H1121><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, Behold, I heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thy father <S%H1><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8764><s%> unto Esav <S%H6215><s%> thy brother <S%H251><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

Bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H8685><s%> me venison <S%H6718><s%>, and make <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8798><s%> me savoury meat <S%H4303><s%>, that I may eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and bless <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8762><s%> thee before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> my death <S%H4194><s%>.
Now therefore, my son <S%H1121><s%>, obey <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8798><s%> my voice <S%H6963><s%> according to that which <S%H834><s%> I command <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8764><s%> thee.

Go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8798><s%> now to the flock <S%H6629><s%>, and fetch <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8798><s%> me from thence two <S%H8147><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> kids <S%H1423><s%> of the goats <S%H5795><s%>; and I will make <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them savoury meat <S%H4303><s%> for thy father <S%H1><s%>, such as he loveth <S%H157><s%> <S%H8804><s%>:

And thou shalt bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H8689><s%> it to thy father <S%H1><s%>, that he may eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and that <S%H834><s%> he may bless <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8762><s%> thee before <S%H6440><s%> his death <S%H4194><s%>.

And Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to Rebekah <S%H7259><s%> his mother <S%H517><s%>, Behold, Esav <S%H6215><s%> my brother <S%H251><s%> is a hairy <S%H8163><s%> man <S%H376><s%>, and I am a smooth <S%H2509><s%> man <S%H376><s%>:

My father <S%H1><s%> peradventure will feel <S%H4959><s%> <S%H8799><s%> me, and I shall seem <S%H5869><s%> to him as a deceiver <S%H8591><s%> <S%H8772><s%>; and I shall bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H8689><s%> a curse <S%H7045><s%> upon me, and not a b'rakhah <S%H1293><s%>.

And his mother <S%H517><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him, Upon me be thy curse <S%H7045><s%>, my son <S%H1121><s%>: only obey <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8798><s%> my voice <S%H6963><s%>, and go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8798><s%> fetch <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8798><s%> me them.

And he went <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and fetched <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and brought <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> them to his mother <S%H517><s%>: and his mother <S%H517><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> savoury meat <S%H4303><s%>, such as his father <S%H1><s%> loved <S%H157><s%> <S%H8804><s%>.

And Rebekah <S%H7259><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> goodly <S%H2532><s%> raiment <S%H899><s%> of her eldest <S%H1419><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> Esav <S%H6215><s%>, which were with her in the house <S%H1004><s%>, and put them upon <S%H3847><s%> <S%H8686><s%> Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%> her younger <S%H6996><s%> son <S%H1121><s%>:

And she put <S%H3847><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the skins <S%H5785><s%> of the kids <S%H1423><s%> of the goats <S%H5795><s%> upon his hands <S%H3027><s%>, and upon the smooth <S%H2513><s%> of his neck <S%H6677><s%>:

And she gave <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the savoury meat <S%H4303><s%> and the bread <S%H3899><s%>, which she had prepared <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of her son <S%H1121><s%> Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%>.

And he came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto his father <S%H1><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, My father <S%H1><s%>: and he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Here am I; who art thou, my son <S%H1121><s%> ?

And Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto his father <S%H1><s%>, I am Esav <S%H6215><s%> thy firstborn <S%H1060><s%>; I have done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> according as thou badest <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> me: arise <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, I pray thee, sit <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8798><s%> and eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8798><s%> of my venison <S%H6718><s%>, that thy soul <S%H5315><s%> may bless <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8762><s%> me.

And Yitz'chak <S%H3327><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto his son <S%H1121><s%>, How is it that thou hast found <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8800><s%> it so quickly <S%H4116><s%> <S%H8765><s%>, my son <S%H1121><s%>? And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Because the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> brought <S%H7136><s%> <S%H8689><s%> it to me <S%H6440><s%>.

And Yitz'chak <S%H3327><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%>, Come near <S%H5066><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, I pray thee, that I may feel <S%H4184><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thee, my son <S%H1121><s%>, whether thou be my very <S%H2088><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> Esav <S%H6215><s%> or not.

And Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%> went near <S%H5066><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Yitz'chak <S%H3327><s%> his father <S%H1><s%>; and he felt <S%H4959><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, The voice <S%H6963><s%> is Ya`akov's <S%H3290><s%> voice <S%H6963><s%>, but the hands <S%H3027><s%> are the hands <S%H3027><s%> of Esav <S%H6215><s%>.

And he discerned <S%H5234><s%> <S%H8689><s%> him not, because his hands <S%H3027><s%> were hairy <S%H8163><s%>, as his brother <S%H251><s%> Esav's <S%H6215><s%> hands <S%H3027><s%>: so he blessed <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8762><s%> him.
And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Art thou my very son <S%H1121><s%> Esav <S%H6215><s%>? And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, I am.

And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Bring it near <S%H5066><s%> <S%H8685><s%> to me, and I will eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of my son's <S%H1121><s%> venison <S%H6718><s%>, that my soul <S%H5315><s%> may bless <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8762><s%> thee. And he brought it near <S%H5066><s%> <S%H8686><s%> to him, and he did eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: and he brought <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> him wine <S%H3196><s%>, and he drank <S%H8354><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.
And his father <S%H1><s%> Yitz'chak <S%H3327><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him, Come near <S%H5066><s%> <S%H8798><s%> now, and kiss <S%H5401><s%> <S%H8798><s%> me, my son <S%H1121><s%>.

And he came near <S%H5066><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and kissed <S%H5401><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him: and he smelled <S%H7306><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the smell <S%H7381><s%> of his raiment <S%H899><s%>, and blessed <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8762><s%> him, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, See <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, the smell <S%H7381><s%> of my son <S%H1121><s%> is as the smell <S%H7381><s%> of a field <S%H7704><s%> which the YY <S%H3068><s%> hath blessed <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8765><s%>:

Therefore 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thee of the dew <S%H2919><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%>, and the fatness <S%H4924><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>, and plenty <S%H7230><s%> of corn <S%H1715><s%> and wine <S%H8492><s%>:

Let people <S%H5971><s%> serve <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thee, and nations <S%H3816><s%> bow down <S%H7812><s%> <S%H8691><s%> to thee: be <S%H1933><s%> <S%H8798><s%> lord <S%H1376><s%> over thy brethren <S%H251><s%>, and let thy mother's <S%H517><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> bow down <S%H7812><s%> <S%H8691><s%> to thee: cursed <S%H779><s%> <S%H8803><s%> be every one that curseht <S%H779><s%> <S%H8802><s%> thee, and blessed <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8803><s%> be he that blesseht <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8764><s%> thee.

And it came to pass, as soon as Yitz'chak <S%H3327><s%> had made an end <S%H3615><s%> <S%H8765><s%> of b'rakhah <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8763><s%> Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%>, and Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%> was yet <S%H389><s%> scarce <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8800><s%> gone out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8804><s%> from the presence <S%H6440><s%> of Yitz'chak <S%H3327><s%> his father <S%H1><s%>, that Esav <S%H6215><s%> his brother <S%H251><s%> came in <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> from his hunting <S%H6718><s%>.

And he also had made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> savoury meat <S%H4303><s%>, and brought it <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> unto his father <S%H1><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto his father <S%H1><s%>, Let my father <S%H1><s%> arise <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of his son's <S%H1121><s%> venison <S%H6718><s%>, that thy soul <S%H5315><s%> may bless <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8762><s%> me.

And Yitz'chak <S%H3327><s%> his father <S%H1><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him, Who art thou? And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, I am thy son <S%H1121><s%>, thy firstborn <S%H1060><s%> Esav <S%H6215><s%>.

And Yitz'chak <S%H3327><s%> trembled <S%H2729><s%> <S%H8799><s%> very <S%H1419><s%> exceedingly <S%H3966><s%> <S%H2731><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Who? where <S%H645><s%> is he that hath taken <S%H6679><s%> <S%H8801><s%> venison <S%H6718><s%>, and brought <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> it me, and I have eaten <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of all before thou camest <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and have blessed <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8762><s%> him? yea, and he shall be blessed <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8803><s%>.

And when Esav <S%H6215><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of his father <S%H1><s%>, he cried <S%H6817><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with a great <S%H1419><s%> and exceeding <S%H3966><s%> bitter <S%H4751><s%> cry <S%H6818><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto his father <S%H1><s%>, Bless <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8761><s%> me, even me also, O my father <S%H1><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Thy brother <S%H251><s%> came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> with subtilty <S%H4820><s%>, and hath taken away <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thy b'rakhah <S%H1293><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Is not he rightly <S%H3588><s%> named <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8804><s%> <S%H8034><s%> Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%>? for he hath supplanted me <S%H6117><s%> <S%H8799><s%> these <S%H2088><s%> two times <S%H6471><s%>: he took away <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8804><s%> my birthright <S%H1062><s%>; and, behold, now he hath taken away <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8804><s%> my b'rakhah <S%H1293><s%>. And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Hast thou not reserved <S%H680><s%> <S%H8804><s%> a b'rakhah <S%H1293><s%> for me?

And Yitz'chak <S%H3327><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Esav <S%H6215><s%>, Behold, I have made <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8804><s%> him thy lord <S%H1376><s%>, and all his brethren <S%H251><s%> have I given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to him for servants <S%H5650><s%>; and with corn <S%H1715><s%> and wine <S%H8492><s%> have I sustained <S%H5564><s%> <S%H8804><s%> him: and what shall I do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> now <S%H645><s%> unto thee, my son <S%H1121><s%> ?

And Esav <S%H6215><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto his father <S%H1><s%>, Hast thou but one <S%H259><s%> b'rakhah <S%H1293><s%>, my father <S%H1><s%>? bless <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8761><s%> me, even me also, O my father <S%H1><s%>. And Esav <S%H6215><s%> lifted up <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his voice <S%H6963><s%>, and wept <S%H1058><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

And Yitz'chak <S%H3327><s%> his father <S%H1><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him, Behold, thy dwelling <S%H4186><s%> shall be the fatness <S%H4924><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>, and of the dew <S%H2919><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%> from above <S%H5920><s%>;

And by thy sword <S%H2719><s%> shalt thou live <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and shalt serve <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thy brother <S%H251><s%>; and it shall come to pass when thou shalt have the dominion <S%H7300><s%> <S%H8686><s%>, that thou shalt break <S%H6561><s%> <S%H8804><s%> his yoke <S%H5923><s%> from off thy neck <S%H6677><s%>.

And Esav <S%H6215><s%> hated <S%H7852><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%> because <S%H5921><s%> of the b'rakhah <S%H1293><s%> wherewith <S%H834><s%> his father <S%H1><s%> blessed him <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8765><s%>: and Esav <S%H6215><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in his heart <S%H3820><s%>, The days <S%H3117><s%> of mourning <S%H60><s%> for my father <S%H1><s%> are at hand <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8799><s%>; then will I slay <S%H2026><s%> <S%H8799><s%> my brother <S%H251><s%> Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%>.

And these words <S%H1697><s%> of Esav <S%H6215><s%> her elder <S%H1419><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> were told <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8714><s%> to Rebekah <S%H7259><s%>: and she sent <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%> her younger <S%H6996><s%> son <S%H1121><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him, Behold, thy brother <S%H251><s%> Esav <S%H6215><s%>, as touching thee, doth comfort <S%H5162><s%> <S%H8693><s%> himself, purposing to kill <S%H2026><s%> <S%H8800><s%> thee.

Now therefore, my son <S%H1121><s%>, obey <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8798><s%> my voice <S%H6963><s%>; and arise <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, flee <S%H1272><s%> <S%H8798><s%> thou to Laban <S%H3837><s%> my brother <S%H251><s%> to Haran <S%H2771><s%>;
And tarry <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8804><s%> with him a few <S%H259><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>, until <S%H834><s%> thy brother's <S%H251><s%> fury <S%H2534><s%> turn away <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%>;

Until thy brother's <S%H251><s%> anger <S%H639><s%> turn away <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8800><s%> from thee, and he forget <S%H7911><s%> <S%H8804><s%> that which thou hast done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to him: then I will send <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and fetch <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thee from thence: why <S%H4100><s%> should I be deprived <S%H7921><s%> <S%H8799><s%> also of you both <S%H8147><s%> in one <S%H259><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> ?
